title: Seeded breadsticks
description: If you don’t have seed and grain bread flour, use the same quantity of white bread flour and add two tablespoons of mixed seeds such as sesame, sunflower and pumpkin seeds.
ingredients: 250g/9oz white seed and grain bread flour
2 tbsp olive oil, plus extra for oiling
a little semolina or polenta, or sesame and poppy seeds, for rolling the breadsticks in
